answers.text:
Hello David,
Outsourcing different kinds of internal affairs investigations seems to be uncommon but not unheard of.  Oakland, CA has contracted out its investigations due to a volume crunch:
http://www.contracostatimes.com/news/ci_20790709/oakland-budgets-750-000-outsource-occupy-complaints
Meanwhile, Napervile, Il has contracted out IA investigations of its police force due to budget cuts:
http://www.mesampa.com/news/napo-comments-on-outsourcing-police
I hope these are helpful resources,
Gabe Brehm
Knowledge Network Intern
ICMA

author: David Ellis
text:
Our City Council is considering a proposal that would establish a Human Rights Commission and contract out the
Investigation, mediation, conciliation  regarding allegations of discrimination in the areas of employment, public accommodations, credit, housing,  and public education.
Is anyone aware of any other jurisdictions that contract out those functions????
Thanks
title: Contracting out ---Human Rights investigations
